00001 #ifndef _STK_COLOR_H_
00002 #define _STK_COLOR_H_
00003 
00004 #include "SDL.h"
00005 
00006 // these data here is prepared for SDL_MapRGB(surface->format, MACRO)
00007 // Global
00008 #define STK_COLOR_GLOBAL_BACKGROUND     0xd4, 0xd4, 0xd4
00009 #define STK_COLOR_GLOBAL_FOREGROUND     0x00, 0x00, 0x00        // red, green, blue
00010 // Label
00011 #define STK_COLOR_LABEL_BACKGROUND      STK_COLOR_GLOBAL_BACKGROUND
00012 #define STK_COLOR_LABEL_FOREGROUND      STK_COLOR_GLOBAL_FOREGROUND
00013 // Button
00014 #define STK_COLOR_BUTTON_BACKGROUND     STK_COLOR_GLOBAL_BACKGROUND
00015 #define STK_COLOR_BUTTON_FOREGROUND     STK_COLOR_GLOBAL_FOREGROUND
00016 // Entry
00017 #define STK_COLOR_ENTRY_BACKGROUND      0xf4, 0xf4, 0xf4
00018 #define STK_COLOR_ENTRY_FOREGROUND      STK_COLOR_GLOBAL_FOREGROUND
00019 #define STK_COLOR_ENTRY_CURSOR          STK_COLOR_GLOBAL_FOREGROUND
00020 // Slidebar
00021 #define STK_COLOR_SLIDEBAR_BACKGROUND   0xe0, 0xe0, 0xe0
00022 #define STK_COLOR_SLIDEBAR_FOREGROUND   0xc4, 0xc4, 0xc4
00023 // RadioButton
00024 #define STK_COLOR_RADIOBUTTON_BACKGROUND        STK_COLOR_GLOBAL_BACKGROUND
00025 #define STK_COLOR_RADIOBUTTON_FOREGROUND        STK_COLOR_GLOBAL_FOREGROUND
00026 // RadioGroup
00027 #define STK_COLOR_RADIOGROUP_BACKGROUND         STK_COLOR_GLOBAL_BACKGROUND
00028 #define STK_COLOR_RADIOGROUP_FOREGROUND         STK_COLOR_GLOBAL_FOREGROUND
00029 // ProgressBar
00030 #define STK_COLOR_PROGRESSBAR_BACKGROUND        0xf4, 0xf4, 0xf4
00031 #define STK_COLOR_PROGRESSBAR_FOREGROUND        STK_COLOR_GLOBAL_FOREGROUND
00032 #define STK_COLOR_PROGRESSBAR_CONTENT           0x00, 0xd0, 0xd0
00033 // MsgBox
00034 #define STK_COLOR_MSGBOX_BACKGROUND     0xf4, 0xf4, 0xf4
00035 #define STK_COLOR_MSGBOX_FOREGROUND     0x10, 0x10, 0x10
00036 
00037 // s is a surface, m is a color macro, c is SDL_Rect
00038 #define STK_MCOLOR2INT(s, m)            ( (Uint32)SDL_MapRGB(s->format, m) )
00039 #define STK_COLOR2INT(s, c)             ( (Uint32)SDL_MapRGB(s->format, c.r, c.g, c.b) )
00040 
00041 
00042 enum STK_ColorType {
00043         STK_COLOR_BACKGROUND,
00044         STK_COLOR_FOREGROUND
00045 };
